name: Rasik Tiwari
tagline: IT Support, Automation, and Cloud-focused engineer building reliable systems end-to-end.
summary: Hands-on IT Support & Infrastructure engineer with strong troubleshooting depth, automation mindset, and a growing focus on cybersecurity and cloud systems. I bring a mix of field experience, MSP workflows, scripting, device management, and practical problem-solving across modern enterprise environments.
about: I work across desktop support, field engineering, automation, cloud tooling, and security-aligned workflows. My experience spans imaging pipelines, Microsoft 365, Intune/Autopilot, Active Directory, hardware lifecycle, and building reliable operational processes. I enjoy solving real-world tech issues, designing clean systems, and documenting solutions that help teams scale. My long-term path is toward GRC and cybersecurity, supported by continuous upskilling, home labs, and hands-on engineering work.

experience.title: IT Support Engineer / Field Services
experience.company: Swift Computers (Client: FL Smidth â€“ Mining)
experience.summary: Supporting enterprise users across desktops, laptops, and meeting-room devices. Handling hardware replacements, imaging, configuration, asset tracking, Intune/Autopilot rollouts, AD join/reset operations, Teams/Outlook issues, network troubleshooting, and incident response. Responsible for diagnostics, root-cause analysis, and coordinating escalations for complex tickets.

experience.title: Technical Support (MSP Training)
experience.summary: Hands-on MSP-style environment training including ticket workflows, remote support, patching, device configuration, M365 troubleshooting, PowerShell basics, and standard operating procedures for end-user support and system administration.

experience.title: IT Student Engineer / Home Lab & Project Work
experience.summary: Built and maintained personal labs for AD DS, Intune, automation pipelines, PowerShell tooling, imaging experiments, and cloud fundamentals. Developed a Gym Management System, portfolio site, and multiple automation scripts for device reporting and system management.

projects.title: Domain Device Reporting Toolkit
projects.description: PowerShell-based automation scripts generating JSON/CSV inventory reports for domain-joined and standalone devices, designed for use in MSP workflows and home labs.

projects.title: L9 Fitness Gym Management System
projects.description: Full-stack gym membership and operational management system built for capstone project, including admin dashboards, booking features, secure login, and scalable architecture.
